code: export var BASE_ASSET_PATH='https://static-assets.codecademy.com/assets';var BASE_STATIC_ASSET_PATH='https://static-assets.codecademy.com/components';export function pathCardAssetPath(pathId){return"".concat(BASE_ASSET_PATH,"/components/cards/path-card/").concat(pathId,".svg");}export function trackCardAssetPath(trackId){return"".concat(BASE_ASSET_PATH,"/components/cards/track-card/").concat(trackId,".svg");}export function trackCardAssetFallbackPath(){return"".concat(BASE_ASSET_PATH,"/components/cards/track-card/img_course_default.svg");}export function pathMarketingPageHeroPath(pathId){return"".concat(BASE_ASSET_PATH,"/path-marketing-page/hero-assets/").concat(pathId,".svg");}export function categoryCardAssetPath(section,category){return"".concat(BASE_ASSET_PATH,"/components/cards/explore-category-card/").concat(section,"/").concat(category,".svg");}export function PathCardAssetPath(pathSlug,pathProgressState){var progressState=pathProgressState?"-".concat(pathProgressState):'';return"".concat(BASE_STATIC_ASSET_PATH,"/curriculum/path/").concat(pathSlug,"/curriculum-card").concat(progressState,".svg");}export function CardPlaceholderAssetPath(pathProgressState){var progressState=pathProgressState?"-".concat(pathProgressState):'';return"".concat(BASE_STATIC_ASSET_PATH,"/curriculum/path/placeholder").concat(progressState,".svg");}
